Agreed...as per the cannibalization... yes IBM will have it but not to the extent of Oracle and SAP. The cloud model really muddies their growth prospects with enterprise application software which is a far greatly proportion of revenue to these two. IBM hangs out in the middleware/DB/OS arena almost exclusively which will be part of large data centers serving up cloud environments so the 'damage'' will be less.
